name: Hello everyone,Welcome.
body:
### Welcome 
Hello, I'm Chris Lee, welcome to my GitHub page. [Chris Lee's GitHub Page](https://github.com/coderChrisLee/chrislee.github.io/), hope this is a wonderful place for learning and sharing.

### Motto
> Knowledge is power,but we are the future.

so let's keep learning, and try to change the world.

### Likes
> reading, running, drinking, coding.

### Contact
Any questions or wanna treat me a coffee, feel free to contact me by `mailto:codechrislee@163.com`.
I will reply soon.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
